<@U0139TY5FDF>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Customer claims to have changed recipes, but not reflected in order`
*Topic:* `Menu & Recipes`
*Priority:* `Low priority ðŸŸ¢`
*Description:* `I'm looking at our remake data and this is what CC has for this customer "Base on the activity log. Cx was able to udpate the meals to Fresh Chicken Grain, Fresh Chicken, Fresh Turkey on November 6, 20258 at 9:39am which is the last day for the customer to make a changes. However, changes did go through and still received an incorrect meal.". But if I look at the actual order it says Fresh Pork, Fresh Turkey, Fresh Beef. This box was delivered 11/11 so the agent is correct that 11/6 was before cutoff and customer changes should have been reflected
6355978/KN16010668`
*Expected behaviour:* `Changes to be reflected`
*Actual behaviour:* `changes do not seem to be reflected`

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue

_thread_replies.text: <!subteam^S05K3MZSD55> - commander didn't have answer, still need help :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: - commander didn't have answer, still need help

_thread_replies.text: Could it be that the user changed the recipes only for their future box, not for the most immediate one? Is there a way we can check this?

elements.text: Could it be that the user changed the recipes only for their future box, not for the most immediate one? Is there a way we can check this?

_thread_replies.text:
<@U03UMPD2NNS> if the user updates their meal when on a future delivery it should be reflected for all deliveries (including earlier ones)
I'll have a look into it today!

elements.text:
if the user updates their meal when on a future delivery it should be reflected for all deliveries (including earlier ones)
I'll have a look into it today!

_thread_replies.text:
<@U0139TY5FDF> found the issue! The user updated their meal selection and shortly after that updated their addons which reverted their selection back to their previous selection. I was only able to reproduce when updating meals + addons directly one after another. When I waited a few minutes between the two actions their meal selection persisted so it might have to do with that the request to save meals is asynchronous and meal selection update still not having been completed. Created a bug ticket to tackle this
<https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/browse/TPT-2342>

elements.text: found the issue! The user updated their meal selection and shortly after that updated their addons which reverted their selection back to their previous selection. I was only able to reproduce when updating meals + addons directly one after another. When I waited a few minutes between the two actions their meal selection persisted so it might have to do with that the request to save meals is asynchronous and meal selection update still not having been completed. Created a bug ticket to tackle this

<@U0139TY5FDF>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Reschedule delivery day bug`
*Topic:* `Checkout`
*Priority:* `Low priority ðŸŸ¢`
*Description:* `I was trying to move my test account up to a Monday delivery. It showed me Monday as a valid delivery day in the calendar view, but then when I clicked it I got a pop up that there was an issue rescheduling to this day. I checked LC and Monday is NOT a valid day, so the popup makes sense, but it shouldn't show as an option on the calendar`
*Expected behaviour:* `Monday not an option on the calendar, so no pop up is required re technical issue`
*Actual behaviour:* `Monday is an option on calendar and then pop up says there was a problem`

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue
attachments.text:

_thread_replies.text:
Regarding the calendar setup, it is a shared component in the White Label brands and as far as I remember it always started with Monday. Probably something we could change as a quick win in the future.

<@U0139TY5FDF> out of the 2 issues you submitted, which out of the 2 is higher prio ?
<!subteam^S05K3MZSD55> - could you take a look regarding the monday that should not be available?
